name: Full Stack Starter
description: This starter codebase includes a React SPA client and a Node/Express RESTful API endpoint that uses a Postgres SQL database.

scripts.postdeploy: sequelize db:migrate; if [ -d seeders ]; then sequelize db:seed:all; fi

REACT_APP_FEATURE_REGISTRATION.description: To enable user registration, enter the value: true

REACT_APP_SITE_TITLE.description: The title of the website that will appear in the browser tab

SESSION_SECRET.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

SMTP_ENABLED.description: To enable sending email (fully configured mail add-on required), enter the value: true
